description:
The Great Goat (山羊様, Yagi-sama) was the otherwise nameless leader of a heretical cult near Albion. He was a tall, thin and slender human wearing the head of a large goat. He became a Pseudo-Apostle by the http://anidb.net/character/91831 [Egg of the Perfect World] and was later killed by Guts.
Berserk Wiki
name: Yagi-sama
